original: Fredholm, Einar August Leonard, direktör, Norrköping, f. 21/10/87 i Älvestad, Östergötl. 1., av grossh. August F. o. Helga Cawallin. G. 19 m. Dagny Enander. Barn: Lars f. 20, Nils 21, Richard 26. — Jur. kand. i Upps. 12. Tingstjg. 12-17, ombudsm. h. Holmens Bruks- & Fabr. A-B 17, led. av styr. f. samma bol. m. dotterbol. samt dir. s’ed. 26. Ordf. li hand :kamm., hand:- o. sjöf:ndn, sjömanshusdir. o. styr. f. Norrköp. Stuveri A-B, v. ordf. i Indrfören. i Norrköp. f. öms. för-säkr., led. av styr. f. Allm. Brand, Södra Sv res stuvareförb., stat. biltra-fiknd, stadsfullm., flera komm. styr. m. m. RVO.
translated: Fredholm, Einar August Leonard, director, Norrköping, b. 21/10/87 in Älvestad, Östergötland, 1st child of August F. and Helga Cawallin. Married in 1919 to Dagny Enander. Children: Lars b. 1920, Nils b. 1921, Richard b. 1926. — Graduated with a law degree from Uppsala University in 1912. Served as a court clerk from 1912-1917, and as a representative for Holmen's Bruks & Fabr. from 1917. He was a member of the board and director of subsidiary companies, becoming a chairman of the trade chamber, commerce and shipping committee, seamen's house director, and on the board of Norrköping Stevedoring Ltd. He was also Vice Chairman of the Insurance Association of Norrköping, a member of the board of Allmänna Brand, Södra Svenska Stuvareförbundet, the state traffic committee, city council, several other municipal boards, and more. He was awarded the Royal Order of Vasa.
